name: Planet Decay
description: You play as the commander of an alien race who have landed on earth with their remaining kins after a disaster struck their home planet. Although Earth has a good supply of needed resources, it is currently not suitable for the aliens to live on. The player must spread decay, which is their source of energy, to survive. However, the humans, whose crop harvest and health are affected by the decay, are fighting you to get off their land.
